skill.name: scientific-slides
skill.description: Build slide decks and presentations for research talks. Use this for making PowerPoint slides, conference presentations, seminar talks, research presentations, thesis defense slides, or any scientific talk. Provides slide structure, design templates, timing guidance, and visual validation. Works with PowerPoint and LaTeX Beamer.
skill.summary: Build slide decks and presentations for research talks. Use this for making PowerPoint slides, confe...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: Scan found presentation guidance and helper scripts only. Network calls target OpenRouter for image generation and review, which matches the documented purpose. No data theft or persistence behavior detected.

content.value_statement: Scientific talks often look crowded and inconsistent. This skill provides structure, design guidance, and AI image generation to build clear, polished slides.
actual_capabilities: Generate slide images or visuals from prompts with optional attachments
Review generated images with Gemini 3 Pro and iterate up to two times
Combine slide images into a single PDF presentation
Convert PDF slides to images for visual inspection
Validate PDF, PPTX, or LaTeX files for size, count, and aspect ratio
Provide Beamer templates and slide design references
limitations: Requires an OpenRouter API key and internet access for AI slide generation
AI iteration is limited to a maximum of two refinement cycles
Validation relies on optional libraries like PyMuPDF, PyPDF2, Pillow, and python-pptx
Does not directly create or edit PPTX files

use_cases.title: Build a defense deck
use_cases.description: Create a thesis defense slide plan, visuals, and a PDF for review.

use_cases.title: Polish a 15 minute talk
use_cases.description: Generate consistent slide images and validate slide count for time limits.

use_cases.title: Standardize lab talks
use_cases.description: Share templates and design rules for consistent lab presentations.

prompt_templates.title: Plan my talk
prompt_templates.scenario: New deck for a short research talk
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a 10 slide outline for a 15 minute talk on my study, with slide titles, key points, and suggested visuals.

prompt_templates.title: Generate a title slide
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a title slide image for a neuroscience talk. Title, subtitle, speaker name, and a clean blue theme.

prompt_templates.title: Create results slide
prompt_templates.prompt: Make a results slide using the attached accuracy chart. Highlight three key findings and include a small citation.

prompt_templates.title: Full deck PDF workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate slide images for my 12 slide plan using a consistent style guide and attach the previous slide each time.

output_examples.input: Create a 12 slide outline for a 15 minute ML conference talk

best_practices: Define a formatting goal and reuse it in every slide prompt
Attach the previous slide to keep consistent style
Keep one main idea per slide with large readable text
anti_patterns: Provide long paragraphs instead of short bullet points
Skip visual review after generating the PDF
Use missing or incorrect API keys

faq.question: Is this compatible with PowerPoint and LaTeX Beamer
faq.answer: Yes. It supports PPTX workflows with visuals and includes Beamer templates.

faq.question: What are the main limits of the AI generator
faq.answer: It needs an OpenRouter API key and allows up to two refinement iterations.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing slide templates
faq.answer: Yes. Use generated visuals inside your template and follow the provided design guides.

faq.question: Is my data sent to external services
faq.answer: Slide prompts and attached images are sent to OpenRouter for generation and review.

faq.question: What should I do if generation fails
faq.answer: Check the API key, network access, and attachment file paths, then retry.

faq.question: How does this compare to manual slide design
faq.answer: It accelerates visual creation but still needs your content and review for accuracy.
